benchmark_details.name: Patent Sentiment Analysis Dataset
benchmark_details.overview: A novel dataset to train Machine Learning algorithms to automate the highlighting of semantic information in patent documents, aiding patent practitioners in quickly identifying key arguments in inventions.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To provide a dataset that assists in the automatic highlighting of important text in patent documents for patent analysis.

data.source: USPTO patents spanning over a decade extracted from XML files
data.annotation: Manually labeled and classified into three categories: positive, negative, and neutral

methodology.calculation: Metrics calculated using standard classification evaluation on test data.
methodology.interpretation: Higher precision, recall, and F1 scores indicate better model performance for identifying relevant patent text.
methodology.baseline_results: NBSVM model achieved a highest F1 score of 97% for one class.
methodology.validation: 5-fold cross-validation used to validate model performance.
